title: Tech Stocks to Watch: Buffett and Musk Go Shopping
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Alex Eule discuss Warren Buffett's investment in HP Inc., Elon Musk's investment in Twitter, and the outlook for software and semiconductor stocks.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Alex Eule discuss Warren Buffett's investment in HP Inc., Elon Musk's investment in Twitter, and the outlook for software and semiconductor stocks.
